content.label: This is an awesome game I have had it for 2-3 years now and I have really seen its improvements. But I would tell anyone to get this game.

I purchased this a while ago and have enjoyed this game off and on for some time now. The graphics are still very nice but this and other Atypical games need to be updated to the newer phones. 

The game itself plays fine but with a larger screen device, it feels cramped in comparison to other games that take advantage of the real estate. 

The onscreen controls kind of get in the way now especially with my meat hooks (fingers).

Kind of wished I knew that it wouldn‚Äôt expand to the newer sizes before I got the other ones to complete the pack. 

Oh well. Still can be a good way to kill some time.

title.label: Great game but minor tweak needed

content.label: I think that this is my favorite ww2 game. But some minor customization tweaks like custom skins for the planes or being able to chose the picture of the lady in the cockpit. Also more campaigns I think would make this game sooooo much better.

I love this game mostly because of the amazing controls and the challenging missions, one thing that I think would be negative is the fact that other planes can easily zoom past you and the targeting is very difficult. Another problem I had with the game was on the bomber mission where you had to shoot down 10 bombers, this was very difficult because I kept flying into the bombers by accident considering I was shooting them for so long. Otherwise, I like this game a lot and I would totally recommend it.

title.label: One of the best ww2 air combat sims ever, & could become the best with a few tweaks

content.label:
This game has only one rival, in terms of absolute best World War Two air combat sims, it badly needs a Russian map, & possibly a campaign to go with it, (maybe North Africa as well), a few more planes like possibly, the avenger, the typhoon, the airacobra, or maybe even the bf110....
A few tweaks would improve it immensely, like being able to choose AI opponents/allies for single practice games, & maybe make it so bombs & rockets have to be reloaded on the ground or carrier, adding more realism & also freeing up the choices for guns/cannons....
(Game has great potential, hope the devs haven‚Äôt quit on it)
You need to add a B17 bomber bomb run mission in campaign
I love the game dogfights a challengingly great

Firstly, ios games are usually not that great but this one is your greatest download ever. It tells story from both the opposition side and the hero side. You play as a pilot for each side of the warzone and it just does the world war 2 fighters such justice as nothing has been forgotten.
Greatest WW2 game I‚Äôve played on the App Store, but I would love to see a Eastern Front Campaign.

This game is crap. The controls are slow and practically useless. I've had this game for awhile and I stopped trying to get on to it, then I tried it again and I'm still disappointed. Going to delete it. If you could control it with a Nimbus SteelCase controller then it could probably be a 5 star game.
This is one of the best WWII Games I have ever played! I hope that you will add a update with American Bombers though. Maybe B-29 Super fortress. Best game ever!
